text: Aloys Wobben (22 January 1952 â€“ 31 July 2021) was a German billionaire businessman and engineer. He was the founder and owner of the wind turbine company Enercon. Wobben was one of the 50 richest people in Germany. Wobben died in July 2021 after a long illness, at the age of 69. ==References== Category:1952 births Category:2021 deaths Category:German businesspeople Category:German mechanical engineers Category:People from Lower Saxony
title: Aloys Wobben
